CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PffBB-n exhibited not only strong and wide absorption but also controllable aggregation behavior in solution and thin films , in which aggregation behavior was greatly influenced by the length of alkyl side chains attached , temperature applied , and solvent used.

Let's think step by step.
1. PffBB-n: This is the name of the material. The "n" indicates that there are different variations of this material, each with a different length of alkyl side chains.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBB: This is the base name of the material.
2. PffBB-n: Variations of the material with different alkyl side chains.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PffBB-n exhibited not only strong and wide absorption but also controllable aggregation behavior in solution and thin films , in which aggregation behavior was greatly influenced by the length of alkyl side chains attached , temperature applied , and solvent used.

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-n: This is a compound or material name. It is not a property name, but rather a specific entity being discussed in the paragraph.
2. strong and wide absorption: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n. It describes the ability of PffBB-n to absorb energy or matter.
3. aggregation behavior: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n. It refers to the tendency of PffBB-n particles to come together and form larger clusters or aggregates.
4. length of alkyl side chains attached: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n that influences its aggregation behavior. It refers to the length of the hydrocarbon chains attached to the main structure of PffBB-n.
5. temperature applied: This is a property or condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n.
6. solvent used: This is a property or condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. strong and wide absorption: This is a property of PffBB-n.
2. aggregation behavior: This is a property of PffBB-n.
3. length of alkyl side chains attached: This is a property of PffBB-n that influences its aggregation behavior.
4. temperature applied: This is a condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n.
5. solvent used: This is a condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PffBB-n exhibited not only strong and wide absorption but also controllable aggregation behavior in solution and thin films , in which aggregation behavior was greatly influenced by the length of alkyl side chains attached , temperature applied , and solvent used.

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-n: This is a compound or material with the abbreviated name "PffBB" and a variable "n" representing some property or characteristic. It can be considered as a "Material" or "Compound" entity, and "n" can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with this entity.
2. Strong and wide absorption: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n in solution. It can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with the "Material" or "Compound" entity PffBB-n.
3. Controllable aggregation behavior: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n in solution and thin films. It can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with the "Material" or "Compound" entity PffBB-n.
4. Length of alkyl side chains: This is a property or characteristic that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n. It can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with the "Material" or "Compound" entity PffBB-n.
5. Temperature applied: This is a property or condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n. It can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with the environmental conditions under which the aggregation behavior is observed.
6. Solvent used: This is a property or condition that influences the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n. It can be considered as a "Property Value" associated with the environmental conditions under which the aggregation behavior is observed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PffBB-n: This is a material with the variable "n" representing some property or characteristic.
2. Strong and wide absorption: This is a property value of PffBB-n in solution.
3. Controllable aggregation behavior: This is a property value of PffBB-n in solution and thin films.
4. Length of alkyl side chains: This is a property value associated with PffBB-n that influences its aggregation behavior.
5. Temperature: This is an environmental condition that can influence the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n, but it is not a property value of the material itself.
6. Solvent: This is an environmental condition that can influence the aggregation behavior of PffBB-n, but it is not a property value of the material itself.
